attributes.action: ensure the Taxpayer receive their money back on all the MP's Expense Claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mp's Expense claims, we funded them now we request our money back. We do not get to claim for nappies, furniture etc etc, so why should the taxpayer pay for MP's Luxury

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
